{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = AC1200 Dual Band Wireless Mini Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Huawei_WS831_(Honor_Cube) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Huawei |model = WS831 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = Honor Cube |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = QIS-WS831 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = HiSilicon;SD5650H; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W631GG6KB-15; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = E0:19:1D, 8C:34:FD |oui = E0:19:1D, 8C:34:FD
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5.1 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = NFC |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.3.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/08/2015 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00UR7WMWA |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192ER; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812AE; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.chineselectronic.com/latest-chinese-electronic-news/huawei-honor-router-is-officially-released/ Press release] *[http://www.homemediatech.net/huawei-honor-ws831-unbiased-review/1356 ''Huawei WS831'' on '''HomeMediaTech'''] *[http://www.gearbest.com/networking-communication/pp_174773.html ''Huawei WS831'' on '''GearBest'''] <small> :● The mainstream of Dual Band 2.4GHz / 5GHz AC Intelligent Routers :Built-in Dual Band balun antenna 2.4GHz 2x2 MIMO, 5GHz 2x2 MIMO :Wireless protocol 802.11 n/ac 2.4GHz (300Mbps), 5GHz (867Mbps) :Interface: 1x USB 2.0, 1x WAN FE (100Mbps), 2x LAN FE (100Mbps) </small> *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/huawei-ws831.shtml ''Huawei WS831'' on '''iXBT'''] :SoC: [[HiSilicon]] SD5650H @1GHz :RAM: 128MB, Flash: 16MB :[[Realtek]] RTL8192ER 2T2R 802.11bgn (2.4GHz) :[[Realtek]] RTL8812AE 2T2R 802.11an/ac (5GHz) :OUI: 8C:34:FD :FW: V100R001C01B018 *[http://mysku.ru/blog/china-stores/32164.html ''Huawei WS831 Honor'' on '''MySku'''] (RU) :"AM1WS831HRM VER" is silkscreened on the board in the photos :IPEX MHF4 RF coaxial connector (the smallest mini RF connector) *[http://www.aliexpress.com/store/product/100-Original-Huawei-WS831-Honor-Wireless-Home-White-Router-Support-2-4G-5G-WiFi-1GHz-CPU/600815_32332038890.html ''Huawei WS831 Honor'' on '''AliExpress'''] :CPU: Hi5650H @1GHz dual-core ARM :RAM: 128MB (DDR3), Flash: 16MB (SPI) :OUI: E0:19:1D (Huawei Corp.) *[http://www.smart4gwifi.com/huawei-ws831-honor-router.html ''Huawei WS831 Honor'' on '''Smart4GWiFi'''] *[http://blog.ich8.com/post/5237 ''Huawei Honor'' on '''blog.ich8.com'''] :CPU: [[HiSilicon]] SD5650 @1GHz; Flash: 16MB (SPI) :RAM: ''Winbond'' W631GG6KB-15 128MB (DDR3 @1333MHz 9-9-9) :2.4GHz RF: [[Realtek]] RTL8192ER (802.11bgn 2×2:2 PCIe) :5GHz RF: [[Realtek]] RTL8812AE (802.11abgn+ac 2×2:2 PCIe) :Eth: 1x FE WAN, 2x FE LAN; USB: 1x USB2.0
==See also== *[[Huawei WS860s (Honor Cube)]] *[http://www.amazon.com/Huawei-wireless-Android-2-5inch-Storage/dp/B00UR7WMWA/ ''Huawei Honor Cube WS860s Wireless Router'' on '''Amazon'''] :CPU @1.5GHz (Android 4.2 / Linux) :HDD 2.5" 1TB SATA 3.0 Storage (version TV Box) *[http://www.au.kddi.com/english/mobile/product/wlan/home_spot_cube_2/spec/ ''KDDI Home Spot Cube2 Router'']
[[Category:English Documentation]]
